title: ServiceAccount with Namespace Role
description: Create a ServiceAccount named ||namespace-admin|| in namespace ||uranus||, create a Role that allows all operations on all resources, and bind them with a RoleBinding named ||admin-binding||.

validations.command: kubectl get serviceaccount namespace-admin -n uranus -o jsonpath='{.metadata.name}'
kubectl get role admin-role -n uranus -o jsonpath='{.rules[0].verbs}'
kubectl get rolebinding admin-binding -n uranus -o jsonpath='{.subjects[0].name}'
validations.description: RoleBinding should bind to namespace-admin ServiceAccount
